summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6155 for the improvement of 3rd Avenue Southwest from Olson Place to approximately 1105 feet north thereof; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86040, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
